author: abdoulline
body:
It turns out that for all the benchmarking plots produced by HCAL and JetMET, 
ts4chi2 parameter (cut) of 15.0 was used, while in the code accepted to 73X 
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/6432/files#diff-6a82963ad6ff7ffb86094dfeb44a72e2R134
it was mistakenly left as 0.
title: ts4chi2 cut fix
